channel.title: jira.namics.com
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4469] AT P // B2B Customer Registration - few corrections of the keys
item.description:
please see the print Screen attached

in it please modify the 2 fields with the 2 texts below

1. UID-Nummer

2. Die Umsatzsteuer-ID beginnt mit „ATU“ gefolgt von 8 Ziffern. zB.: ATU12345678
item.summary: AT P // B2B Customer Registration - few corrections of the keys

comments.comment: fixed

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4468] FF // wrong availability
item.description:
In the searchresults on Live & Test the availability for example for article 508086 is shown as 24h. When you open the product-detail page it says then > 7 t.
Is this because of a missing FF-Import?

comments.comment:
There are also different availabilities on the detail page and the compare site.
---> example product: 667902

Bug fixed.

However, there is a UI flaw...
On the product detail page the availability "traffic lights" (green, light green, yellow, orange) do not honor the requested quantity.
E.g.: There are two items of an article on stock. Availability is green. If the order amount is raised to 3 items, the availability still shows "green" - which in fact is wrong.
=> Could be changed by performing a backend call on each change of the requested amount. Drawback: Additional backend calls. As we cache the ERP result in hybris, this should not have a negative influence on SAP (but only of hybris).
If you want to change the functionality, create a new Jira ticket with a link to this ticket, please.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4433] OCI Interface has problem with " in descriptions
item.description:
Hello,
If you look at the Quelltext in NEW_ITEM-DESCRIPTION is a " wich generates a Problem at the customers Interface to SAP (two "). Desrcriptions without " are OK.
Please think about a solution. html e.g. "

Quelltext:
........

SAP_bindPageToDomain();
var postArray = new Array();
postArray.push(

{name:"NavMode" , value:"3"}

);
postArray.push(

{name:"Escaped" , value:"true"}

);
postArray.push(

{name:"UsePost" , value:"True"}

);
postArray.push(

{name:"SAPSRM_RESUME_ID" , value:"SAPSRM_OCI"}

);
postArray.push(

{name:"NEW_ITEM-DESCRIPTION[1]" , value:"Switch 16x 10/100/1000 2x SFP 19""}

);
postArray.push(

{name:"NEW_ITEM-UNIT[1]" , value:"PCE"}

);
postArray.push(

{name:"NEW_ITEM-PRICE[1]" , value:"127.96"}

);
postArray.push(

{name:"NEW_ITEM-PRICEUNIT[1]" , value:"1"}

);
postArray.push(

{name:"NEW_ITEM-QUANTITY[1]" , value:"1"}

);
postArray.push(

{name:"NEW_ITEM-CURRENCY[1]" , value:"CHF"}

);
postArray.push(

{name:"NEW_ITEM-VENDORMAT[1]" , value:"842968"}

);
postArray.push(

{name:"NEW_ITEM-LEADTIME[1]" , value:"1"}

);
postArray.push(

{name:"NEW_ITEM-MATGROUP[1]" , value:"Z000000"}

);
function sendForm() {

.......

Freundliche Grüsse

Barbara Bürgisser
Projektleiterin Supply Chain Excellence
Generaldirektion
Finanzen und Controlling

Schweizerische Radio- und Fernsehgesellschaft
Giacomettistrasse 1, 3000 Bern 31
Telefon +41 31 350 91 11
Telefon direkt +41 31 350 95 79
Fax +41 31 350 97 47

barbara.buergisser@srgssr.ch
www.srgssr.ch
item.summary: OCI Interface has problem with " in descriptions

comments.comment:
Added: desc = HtmlUtils.htmlEscape(desc);

old:

Switch 16x 10/100/1000 2x SFP 19", TL-SG2216, TP-Link

new:

Switch 16x 10/100/1000 2x SFP 19", TL-SG2216, TP-Link
done

Not Ok! Testet with customer. See my screenshot

testet with this URL:
https://www.distrelec.ch/ociEntry?username=srgssr-ch-ger@oci.distrelec&password=tiAvUCmD&oci_version=4.0&hook_url=http://q08.elfa.se:50000/elfa3/catalogdb/DisplayParametersServlet&oci_version=4.0

This is not yet deployed.

It will be deployed with version "v2.0.12" (see "Fix Version")

On Production is now: v2.0.11 (Revision: 9465)
Code Free for the version v2.0.11 was on the 25.6.2014 14:00.

Please retest after the next deployment.

Best Regards
René

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4423] "badges" covering product title in SERP/Product list
item.description: Some of the promotion badges are covering the product title in the product list/SERP.
item.summary: "badges" covering product title in SERP/Product list

comments.comment:
This is a test issue: the text must be shortened to not cover the product title.

The root is a translation error: The translation agency meant to offer 2 options ("meilleur prix" OR "prix top"). Only one of them should be used.
Stefanie, which should it be?
Hi Nando, please use "Meilleur prix"

Nabil,
please shorten the French "top price" label/property to "Meilleur prix".
fixed in both HP-Q and HP-P

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4420] Search: Define keyword length
item.description:
Through our "Toner-Finder" you get the following search result list:
http://www.distrelec.ch/search?UfThru=&q=763703%7C%7C855078%7C%7C855079%7C%7C858616%7C%7C855080%7C%7C855081%7C%7C856004%7C%7C856005%7C%7C856855%7C%7C856852%7C%7C856853%7C%7C856854%7C%7C&log=internal

Could you please define the following rule:
If the length of a search keyword is bigger than 30 digits please cut the title on the search result page and add "..." instead of the last 3 digits.

comments.comment: @Jan: Please fix in css, so that just one line is displayed and suffixed with "..." if it is too long.

Fixed in CSS, can be tested after next deployment, see screenshot..
Jan
Fixed in branch, too. Available as of v2.0.12.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4284] IF-11 Order Calculation (place order): Provide the possibility to transmit to SAP the Hybris Order number
item.description:
Hello Ligia and Maciej
during the place order with IF-11 we would like to send to SAP also the Hybris Order Number.

This could be useful to easily find the referenced order in SAP and Hybris.

Could you please add the field webshopOrderCode to the request the new field according with the new specifications here?

https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/IF-11+Order+Calculation
item.summary: IF-11 Order Calculation (place order): Provide the possibility to transmit to SAP the Hybris Order number

comments.comment:
Hi Francesco,

Could you please let me know how this field will be used after it is sent to SAP by Webshop?
After you send this field to SAP we should identify the place where it should be saved. If you have more information about how this field is used in SAP, please let me know.

Best Regards,
Ligia

Hi Ligia
as far as i know it should be used as the External Order Number.
But I don't know the name of the field in SAP.

Hi Francesco,

I identified in the system an old sales order with a reference for Web transaction. Could you please take a look on the print screen attached and let me know if this is the field you are talking about?
Please take aware also that this field has the length 35 and not 255 as you specified in IF-11 specifications.

Best Regards,
Ligia

Hello Gazwan,
Could you please indicate a field where we could save the Hybris order number into SAP so could be easy in case of issues to identify the Hybris order number? Is there any text field which is not printed and they guys could use?

Hello Gazwan/Evangelos
do you have any news about this issue?
@Florian: during my holidays someone should implement the change in hybris when the SAP team will provide the new WSDL.

Hi Evangelos

I have now tested the print outs and nothing from the text I wrote in the field VBKD-IHREZ is printed.
You can double check if you want, order number in Q01 is 73634836.

Med vänlig hälsning | Best regards

Gazwan Issa
Sales SAP Super user

Hello Francesco,
Found has been found could you please proceed accordingly with the Wiki update and let us know when to proceed?

Hi Evangelos
i've updated the specifications for IF-11 Order Calculation.
https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/IF-11+Order+Calculation

The new field is called: webshopOrderCode

Hello Maciej,
Could you please update your schema accordingly? I have updated the FSP. Please send the ticket over to Ligia afterwards.

Hi Ligia,
additional field added to schema (on D), please proceed with ABAP part.

Hi Evangelos,

Also the ABAP part is implemented. Please check in D01 and let us know when we should transport.

Best Regards,
Ligia
Can you please tesst? This is done in D and Q

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4194] hybris order code vs. SAP order code
item.description:
hybris is generating a cart/order code that will be used for tracking (webtrekk) and also for the DIBS payment reference.

SAP does currently not know this hybris cart/order code.

CR: Add a string attribute to the IF-11 interface to send the hybris ID to SAP. This ID will be sent in each IF-11 call and might be mandatory.
item.summary: hybris order code vs. SAP order code

comments.comment: implementation is complete.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3994] Delta import of PIM products too large
item.description:
During a PIM import only changed products will be imported. If the hash value over a product is unchanged, no import is required.

Why do so many products change each time?
item.summary: Delta import of PIM products too large

comments.comment: Is this a question for Oender?
No, it's a check that has to be done by me (or Raphael).

The problem is related to the order of XML sibling nodes. It seems that the order of siblings are changing from one export to another. The content is 100% identical, but the hash value will change if the order changes. => unnecessary import.
The attachments show the difference from two exports di01846475-20140609.xml / di01846475-20140612.xml

@Önder: Please check with Stibo whether they can avoid the current random order.
Hallo Patrick, bitte wie besprochen, mit Stibo abklären. Danke

Note: with the Manufactuer-Issue which we had (Stibo Issue DISTRE-1401) following the statement from Stibo:

----------------------------------
This is no error as long as the file are well formed as long as the build following the correct DTD politics.
As we mentioned previously you cannot read this file "line by line"
-------------------------------------
Resolved. Order of XML lines are no longer relevant to generate the hash value.

comments.comment: @Cornel: It has happen again. So I thought to open this ticket to analyse it in more deep.

Unfortunately we were not able to reproduce this error on a development environment. However, we identified a code sequence were a local session is created but not removed anyomore. This issue was fixed.

Please reopen the ticket if the error occurs again.

Error occured again (in version 1.0.4). Code change mentioned above (executeInLocalView) did not solve the problem.

HP-Q: (Import was running for 13h 19m 41s)

07 Feb 2014 13:56:39 WARN  [task-scheduler-2] [JaloSession] Could not remove JaloSession JaloSession: (master/s849450673072,USERUID:admin) from http session 9EEA0FF20E91B411E04E32347E60CBDB since http session is not current one (current is null)

The reason for losing the session in case of HP-Q is unknown. => so I reopen this ticket.
But in the HP-P case, we know the reason for losing the session. (Raphael used the "delete all JaloSessions" functionality in the hAC and did not considered this side effect.)
Any further action needed here?
@Raphael: Have you already created a hybris ticket for this issue?

I started asking questions about this seldom session behavior in https://jira.hybris.com/browse/SUP-11740.
The import was running the whole weekend without having this session problem! On Monday 02:02:00 we lost the session again. Maybe the problem is related to other activities that are not there during the weekend? (e.g. ERP import)
As of version v1.1.18 we use a distinct hybris user (technicalPIMImportUser instead of admin) to run the PIM import. This might have an impact on this issue.
Will be verified once v2.0 is in production.

Is this still an issue?
Are there any todos left on this topic?
Yes, it's still a problem.
@Raphael: Since the problem now appeared during a CSV import, too - I suggest to consult hybris for this problem. Can you please contact hybris?

Due to a bug in JaloSession.close() under certain conditions our PimImportJob still crashed. We must NOT use a localView to run the job since the localSessionContexts may get removed by mistake (hybris platform bug: see https://jira.hybris.com/browse/SUP-12672)
But we have to ensure we use a proper JaloSession having no httpSessionId from a last usage (former request).
